module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *2.12.0.1* Add log_membername_as_agent advanced setting *2.12.0.0* Newer GUI, standarize module components *2.11.0.30* Fix recordings being deleted when queue continue is selected *2.11.0.29* Rebranding *2.11.0.28* Set url parameter to variable QURL *2.11.0.26* Initial Issabel Foundation release
